name: Randomise
author: Nipype (interface)
description:
Randomise, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.fsl, interface: Randomise).
FSL Randomise: feeds the 4D projected FA data into GLM modelling and thresholding in order to find voxels which correlate with your model
Example ------- >>> import nipype.interfaces.fsl as fsl >>> rand = fsl.Randomise(in_file='allFA.nii', mask = 'mask.nii', tcon='design.con', design_mat='design.mat') >>> rand.cmdline 'randomise -i allFA.nii -o "randomise" -d design.mat -t design.con -m mask.nii'

inputs.name: Args
inputs.description: A string. Additional parameters to the command.

inputs.name: Base name
inputs.description: A string. The rootname that all generated files will have.

inputs.name: C thresh
inputs.description: A float. Carry out cluster-based thresholding.

inputs.name: Cm thresh
inputs.description: A float. Carry out cluster-mass-based thresholding.

inputs.name: Demean
inputs.description: A boolean. Demean data temporally before model fitting.

inputs.name: Design mat
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Design matrix file.

inputs.name: F c thresh
inputs.description: A float. Carry out f cluster thresholding.

inputs.name: F cm thresh
inputs.description: A float. Carry out f cluster-mass thresholding.

inputs.name: F only
inputs.description: A boolean. Calculate f-statistics only.

inputs.name: Fcon
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. F contrasts file.

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. 4d input file.

inputs.name: Mask
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Mask image.

inputs.name: Num perm
inputs.description: An integer. Number of permutations (default 5000, set to 0 for exhaustive).

inputs.name: One sample group mean
inputs.description: A boolean. Perform 1-sample group-mean test instead of generic permutation test.

inputs.name: Output type
inputs.description: 'nifti' or 'nifti_pair' or 'nifti_gz' or 'nifti_pair_gz'. Fsl output type.

inputs.name: P vec n dist files
inputs.description: A boolean. Output permutation vector and null distribution text files.

inputs.name: Raw stats imgs
inputs.description: A boolean. Output raw ( unpermuted ) statistic images.

inputs.name: Seed
inputs.description: An integer. Specific integer seed for random number generator.

inputs.name: Show info parallel mode
inputs.description: A boolean. Print out information required for parallel mode and exit.

inputs.name: Show total perms
inputs.description: A boolean. Print out how many unique permutations would be generated and exit.

inputs.name: Tcon
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. T contrasts file.

inputs.name: Tfce
inputs.description: A boolean. Carry out threshold-free cluster enhancement.

inputs.name: Tfce2d
inputs.description: A boolean. Carry out threshold-free cluster enhancement with 2d optimisation.

inputs.name: Tfce c
inputs.description: A float. Tfce connectivity (6 or 26; default=6).

inputs.name: Tfce e
inputs.description: A float. Tfce extent parameter (default=0.5).

inputs.name: Tfce h
inputs.description: A float. Tfce height parameter (default=2).

inputs.name: Var smooth
inputs.description: An integer. Use variance smoothing (std is in mm).

inputs.name: Vox p values
inputs.description: A boolean. Output voxelwise (corrected and uncorrected) p-value images.

inputs.name: X block labels
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Exchangeability block labels file.

output-files.name: F corrected p files
output-files.description: A list of items which are a pathlike object or string representing an existing file. F contrast fwe (family-wise error) corrected p values files.

output-files.name: F p files
output-files.description: A list of items which are a pathlike object or string representing an existing file. F contrast uncorrected p values files.

output-files.name: Fstat files
output-files.description: A list of items which are a pathlike object or string representing an existing file. F contrast raw statistic.

output-files.name: T corrected p files
output-files.description: A list of items which are a pathlike object or string representing an existing file. T contrast fwe (family-wise error) corrected p values files.

output-files.name: T p files
output-files.description: A list of items which are a pathlike object or string representing an existing file. F contrast uncorrected p values files.

output-files.name: Tstat files
output-files.description: A list of items which are a pathlike object or string representing an existing file. T contrast raw statistic.
